control.label: $LOCALIZE[31079]
control.visible: [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(genres) | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(addons) | Container.Content(songs) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(genres)] + !Skin.HasSetting(Disable.ShiftView)

control.label: $LOCALIZE[31077]
control.visible: [Container.Content(addons) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(genres) | Container.Content(years) | Window.IsActive(pictures) | Container.Content(files)] + !Skin.HasSetting(Disable.ShowCaseView)

control.label: $LOCALIZE[536]
control.visible: ![Window.IsActive(FavouritesBrowser) | Window.IsActive(tvchannels) | Window.IsActive(tvrecordings) | Window.IsActive(tvguide) | Window.IsActive(tvtimers) | Window.IsActive(tvsearch) | Window.IsActive(musicplaylist) | Window.IsActive(radiochannels) | Window.IsActive(radiorecordings) | Window.IsActive(radioguide) | Window.IsActive(radiotimers) | Window.IsActive(radiosearch) | [Window.IsActive(pictures) + Container.Content(addons)]]
